prompt.name: prompt_incorrect1
prompt.text:
Oops! That's not correct!
The next few questions will help you solve the problem.

prompt.name: prompt_incorrect2
prompt.text:
Oops! That's not correct!
#fractionQuestion# = #correctAnswer#.

prompt.name: incorrectCarry1
prompt.text: Is #currentValue# = #dividend#? Try again.

prompt.name: incorrectCarry2
prompt.text:
We need to add a 0 to the number so that the value remains the same.
#currentValue# = #dividend#

prompt.name: title
prompt.text: Dividing Decimals

prompt.name: mainQ
prompt.text: Solve and write the answer.

prompt.name: prompt1
prompt.text: Please specify your answer !

prompt.name: prompt2
prompt.text:
Incorrect!
The following example will help you.

prompt.name: prompt3
prompt.text: That's Correct! Move Ahead.

prompt.name: prompt4
prompt.text:
Incorrect!
#dividend# needs to be multiplied by the same number as #divisor#.

prompt.name: prompt5
prompt.text:
Incorrect!
The correct answer is #multiplicationFactor#.

prompt.name: prompt6
prompt.text: So dividing #dividend# by #divisor# is same as dividing

prompt.name: prompt7
prompt.text:
Incorrect !
The correct answer is #dividend# × #multiplicationFactor# =

prompt.name: prompt8
prompt.text: See the equation above and try again.

prompt.name: prompt9
prompt.text:
Incorrect!
The correct answer is

prompt.name: incorrectLine1
prompt.text: Dividing a decimal number by another becomes easier if we convert the denominator to a whole number.

prompt.name: incorrectLine2
prompt.text: Let's see an example.

prompt.name: incorrectLine3
prompt.text:
We will convert #temp2# into #temp4#.
For this we need to multiply #temp2# by #multiplicationFactor#.

prompt.name: incorrectLine4
prompt.text: But to keep the number unchanged, we need to multiply the numerator also by #multiplicationFactor#.

prompt.name: incorrectLine5
prompt.text: It is easier to solve this expression.

prompt.name: mainMessage
prompt.text: Which of the following would be the correct step to follow now.

prompt.name: tryAnswering
prompt.text: Try answering the below question!

prompt.name: sparkiePrompt1
prompt.text: Write the correct number in the correct position.

prompt.name: sparkiePrompt2
prompt.text: Now enter the quotient in the space provided.

prompt.name: sparkie_digitPlace_incorrect
prompt.text: Read Carefully!

prompt.name: digitPlace_incorrect_1
prompt.text:
You should place the decimal point now, As the whole number part of the dividend is less than the divisor.
Try Again.

prompt.name: digitPlace_incorrect_2
prompt.text: This is the correct place for the decimal point.

prompt.name: wrong_quotient_less
prompt.text: Does #divisor# divide #currentDividend# only #enteredValue# time(s)?

prompt.name: wrong_quotient_more
prompt.text: Does #divisor# divide #currentDividend#, #enteredValue# time(s)?

prompt.name: answerQuestion
prompt.text: Answer the question!

prompt.name: multiplyWrongProduct
prompt.text: Multiply #convertedDivisor# with #enteredInput# and enter your answer in the correct position.

prompt.name: decimal_incorrect1
prompt.text:
You can put the decimal point after dividing the whole number part of the dividend.
Try again.

prompt.name: decimal_incorrect2
prompt.text: This is not the correct place for decimal point. Enter the next digit of the quotient.

prompt.name: digit_incorrect1
prompt.text:
You can put the decimal point now, as the whole number part of the dividend is divided.
Try again.

prompt.name: digit_incorrect2
prompt.text: This is the correct place for decimal point.

prompt.name: wrong_quotient_1
prompt.text: Hey! Are you entering the answer in the correct position?

prompt.name: wrong_quotient_yes
prompt.text: Check again! You are entering the answer in the wrong position.

prompt.name: wrong_quotient_2
prompt.text:
Let us understand how we find the correct position for the first digit.

#number1# < #number2#. So, we consider the next digit.

prompt.name: wrong_quotient_3
prompt.text: #number1# > #number2#. So, we have to write the first digit here.

prompt.name: readCareFully
prompt.text: Read carefully!

prompt.name: enterQuotient
prompt.text: Now start entering the quotient.

prompt.name: tablePanel1
prompt.text: #num3# x #num5# = #num6# is greater than #_number1#. And #num3# x #num7# = #num8# is smaller than #_number1#. Since #num3# x #bestAnswer# = #promptCorrectAnswer#, #bestAnswer# is the right answer.

prompt.name: tablePanel2
prompt.text: #num3# x #num4# = #num9# is greater than #_number1#. Therefore, #num4# will not work. Which number would you like to try next?

prompt.name: tablePanel3
prompt.text: #num3# x #num4# = #num9# is lesser than #_number1#. But are we sure that a number greater than #num4# will not work? Try a higher number.

prompt.name: tablePanel4
prompt.text: You have to try with a number lesser than #num4#

prompt.name: tablePanel5
prompt.text: You have to try with a number greater than #num4#

prompt.name: tablePanel6
prompt.text: You have already tried with this number.

prompt.name: tablePanel7
prompt.text:
Lets try with #bestNextAnswer#.
Click ok to continue.

prompt.name: tablePanel8
prompt.text:
Lets try with #bestNextAnswer#.
Click ok to continue.

prompt.name: whatDigitCanBePlacedHere
prompt.text: What digit can be placed here without changing the value of the dividend?

prompt.name: bringDown
prompt.text: Now bring down the next digit of the dividend and press enter.

prompt.name: bringDown2
prompt.text: That is incorrect. The correct digit will be entered for you.

prompt.name: nowEnterNextQuotient
prompt.text: Good! Now enter the next digit of the quotient and press enter.

prompt.name: nowEnterAnswer
prompt.text: Good! Now enter your final answer in the space provided above.

prompt.name: giveValidInput
prompt.text: Please enter a valid digit in the text box.

prompt.name: writeDifference
prompt.text: Correct! Now enter the difference and press enter.

prompt.name: writeProduct
prompt.text: Now enter the product and press enter.

prompt.name: startQuotient
prompt.text: Now start entering the quotient.

prompt.name: tablePanelWrong1
prompt.text: Check your multiplication!

prompt.name: tablePanelWrong2
prompt.text: Your product is still incorrect. Try multiplying again!

prompt.name: tablePanelWrong3
prompt.text: That is not correct. Check your multiplication again!

misc.name: placeDigit
misc.text: Enter the next digit of quotient
